name: Shoeboxed
description: Shoeboxed makes it easy for consumers and businesses to manage receipts and business cards. Shoeboxed Inc was founded in 2007 by Internet entrepreneur Taylor Mingos. Shoeboxed is headquartered in Durham, NC near the Research Triangle Park (RTP). Shoeboxed is funded by a number of Internet investors, including Michael Brehm, one of the founders of the popular German social networking site, studiVZ.net.
